Billionaire 2k22

Billionaire2k22, stealth launched on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) on 17/01/2022. The dev team have been proven to deliver. The tokenomics include a 9% Marketing/Development, 2% charity fund for victims of Covid19 & 3% Auto-Liquidity. Dont miss this next 1000x gem.
